td.br: Please complete this survey if you would like to be considered for Fall 2020 Pre-K Counts through LVCC. Face to face appointments have been delayed due to the COVID-19 outbreak but you will be contacted by phone or email within two weeks to explain the full application process.

td.a: Need a mask? Try making one :)
td.br: EASD Art teacher Christine Frobase shares directions in a YouTube video, and a PDF with some different mask making ideas is also attached!

Check out our new Tech Help 4 Staff pages, with information staff members can use during these work at home days. Help info includes: Secure School, Google Apps, Email, Seesaw, Zoom, Google Meet, Attendance, Teaching from Home and McGraw Hill.

font.i: Thank you for the continued support of your student‚Äôs remote learning.¬† We know this has been an adjustment for you and your family.¬† As you know, the Governor has extended the school closure through the end of the year so your children will need your guidance with this new teaching and learning process.¬† The teachers are presenting new content. It is critical that your children stay engaged using the on-line platforms as that is the only way to receive instruction.¬† That being said, the paper-pencil learning packets will continue to be available to families who are unable to access instruction on-line.¬† Starting today, Monday, there will be a return bin for completed packets at each site. please place your completed packets in the bins. Please make certain your student‚Äôs name, school and teacher‚Äôs name is written on the pack cover.¬†They¬†will be retrieved each Friday.¬† If you are able to scan or take pictures and email images of the completed work to your teacher, you will not need to submit the hard copies.¬†
